audience: Individuals and professionals seeking effective note management and productivity enhancement

sections.intent: Hook the audience and establish context
keyPoints: Breathe life into your every thought.
Muse built the v1 for the deck.
Overview of the presentation's purpose.
Notes are often unorganized and rarely revisited.
72% of people report having ephemeral ideas that go uncaptured.
The average employee wastes ~1.8 hours per workday looking for information.

sections.intent: Present Muse as the solution to the problem
keyPoints: Muse serves as a flywheel of inspiration, transforming passive capture into proactive knowledge creation.
It uses proprietary LLMs and user-specific embeddings to build a private knowledge graph.
Features include frictionless input and reasoning-empowered recall.
Contextual understanding through smart surfacing.
Proactively generates deliverables like documents and playlists.
Analyzes notes in relation to each other for enhanced retrieval.

sections.intent: Highlight the potential market for Muse
keyPoints: Growing demand for productivity tools.
Significant time and cost savings for businesses.
Potential to capture a large user base with innovative features.

sections.intent: Outline how Muse will generate revenue
keyPoints: Subscription-based model for individual users.
Enterprise solutions for businesses.
Potential partnerships with educational institutions.

sections.intent: Show evidence of progress and user interest
keyPoints: Initial user feedback and testimonials.
Beta testing results and engagement metrics.
Partnerships or collaborations established.

sections.intent: Specify what is needed from the audience
keyPoints: Funding requirements for further development.
Partnership opportunities for market expansion.
Support in user acquisition and marketing efforts.
